name: SUPER BALL (SnowyOwl)
description:
Play against your friend in a match of SUPER BALL. Add modifiers to spice up the matches, choose how many points a team has to get to win, and pick from a selection of different fields to play on!

CONTROLS

TEAMJUMPMOVE LEFTMOVE RIGHTROTATE CLOCKWISEROTATE COUNTER-CLOCKWISEREDWADEQBLUEIJLOU

I made this game in less than a week for fun, I hope you can have fun playing this game with your friends. I plan to add more if I get the time.
